---
title: "Compare ABXpy scores"
output: html_document
---

Creates a file with 2+ sets of results to compare the scores

```{r}
first <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_large.csv", "\t")
second <- readr::read_delim("../results/results_small.csv", "\t")

first$score_large <- first$score
first$score <- NULL

second$score_small <- second$score
second$score <- NULL

comparison <- dplyr::inner_join(first, second,
                                by=c(type_2="type_2", type_1="type_1", by="by", n="n"))

write.csv(comparison, "../results/comparison_small_large_mfcc.csv")
```
